## PipeEndpoints type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare type PipeEndpoints =
	| Endpoint<
			'GET',
			'/v1/pipe/rooms',
			{
				rooms: Room[];
			}
	  >
	| Endpoint<
			'POST',
			'/v1/pipe/rooms',
			{
				room: Room;
			},
			{
				name: string;
				ingest_protocol: 'rtmp' | 'rtp';
				delivery_protocols: DeliveryProtocol[];
				region: Regions;
				ephemeral: boolean;
				llhls_config?: {
					wcl_delay: number;
					artificial_delay: number;
					max_playout_bitrate_preset: string;
				};
			}
	  >
	| Endpoint<'DELETE', '/v1/pipe/rooms/:room_id', Empty>;
```
